content:
Told then FBI general counsel James Baker about the alpha bank server activities before the two thousand sixty and election
He apparently shared the information with the slate journalist who wrote the story about
The supposed it's secret server
And guess what James Baker the former FBI general counsel testified behind closed doors closed doors last week so we don't know what other GM's he has released
[noise] but rest assured as long as congressional Republicans retained the house so that they can keep dragging these FBI officials before them there are so many sordid details
That still need to be unpacked and for those of you are frustrated and rightfully so recognized this
We're dealing with the FBI we're dealing with the highest levels including the director of the FBI and his top tier
Of officials unpacking what they've done is not an easy thing it's not an easy thing at all it's a dangerous thing it's a frightening thing but that process is underway
And I think some of them if they haven't already been done to correct I think if congressional Republicans will keep the heat on them
I think that you will see some of them beginning to crack especially if it looks like the pressure is on them my fear is we're twenty nine days from election day if Republicans don't hold the house and I think they will
If Republicans don't hold the house
Then Nancy Pelosi becomes the speaker and any investigation into the
FBI and the Democrat Party and Hillary's campaign the DNC and the media any and all investigations into that as the driven by Congress will evaporate
And the sad sad reality is that we may never know exactly what happened
We may still never know but it gives me great joy to know that those FBI officials at the top ranks who were part of this or squirming Peter ... with his little whimpering ways and Coby Coby has to have
At his core a fear that the things he was up to will be disclosed he has to deep down worry because Donald Trump is not a shrinking violet
And if he gets the goods on ... he's going to pursue it it's personal
And we're at the point now where Trump has shown he does not fair these people these into deep he he is not walking away from the Bruce or isn't the Peter straws extend the Rod Rosenstein means
And Bob Mueller by the way whereas our Russian collusion
Here we are closing in on two years whereas our Russian collusion
I don't care about how much money they spent because it's a drop in the bucket for the federal government and I actually think that you do investigations when they're warranted this one wasn't to
Arrive at the truth and the cost to society is far greater than the cost of an investigation if you've got corruption run 'em up but
I don't think this investigation into trouble with the gun in good faith I think it was based on planted in a ... planted information I think they knew that there was nothing there I think this was intended to be able to harass him
Which it has done to his credit he he's managed to accomplish as as Mary Madeleine said nothing short of a miracle
He has accomplished [noise] but I Will leave you with a bit of uncertainty and that is what will ...
